SKS Solar Company Limited

SKS SOLAR (SALES & SERVICES) COMPANY LIMITED is a Myanmar-based solar energy company. It was orignally founded in 2021 as "SKS Solar Service" and then officially re-established as a company in 2023.

Our Mission & Vision

Our Mission

To power a sustainable future with accessible solar energy solutions.

Our Vision

A world thriving on clean, independent solar power.

Our Values

  • Sustainability
  • Innovation
  • Quality Service
  • Long-term Partnership
  • Community Empowerment

Our Core Business

We specialize in providing complete Solar PV systems for both on-grid and off-grid applications using high-quality branded equipment.

Our products & services include:

Solar Panels

Inverters

Solar Lithium Batteries

Renewable Energy Solutions

System Design

Installation & Maintenance

Partnership brands
